moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nc3 e6 3. e4: I like gambits.  This gives good opportunities to develop pieces.
moves.3... dxe4 4. f3 exf3: Black decides to accept my sacrifices and helps me develop my pieces.
moves.12... Bxc3 13. bxc3 Qxc3 14. Bxf5 Ne7: Prevents 15. Qd8. But what was about to come ..... .
moves.16. Bxg6+ Nxg6 17. Qd8#: One of my history professors loved to repeat ancient Roman proverb: " Non in multitudine exercitu victoria belli!"   - " Big army doesn't means victory in war!"
